title: $700,000,000 networth and your still failing to manage your issues.
body: Thoughts on this everyone? How can you be the HIGHEST EARNING f2p game ever, and have these issues? DC's, AFK structure.. 4v5 u lose lp 9 out of 10 times. LEAVER BUSTER for lag. Tribunal system is a sham.. I mean really how can u not afford to better your equipment or hirer real professionals to do it for you.. Apparently your just in it for the money. Must be nice.
